name: amazon-clone
info: Integrated Stripe API for secure payment processing, enhancing the e-commerce functionality.
Enhanced cloud functionality with Firebase, integrating authentication, authorization, and encryption for improved data protection and privacy.

name: tic-tec-toe
info: Developed a cross-platform social media application for finding research papers and collaborating with authors.
Features include user authentication, text-to-speech and a recommendation system using Gemini's AI model for generating text embeddings.
